scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.start:backend: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? process.exit(1) : process.exit(0)" && npm run start:backend:unix || npm run start:backend:win
scripts.dev: concurrently -n frontend,backend -c blue,green "cd frontend && npm start" "npm run start:backend"
